intervention_catalogue.name: Womens Services
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
The Women’s CRS are a holistic service which is made up of the following services which are tailored to specific needs and characteristics of females on probation:
 - Accommodation 
 - Education, Training and Employment 
- Family and significant others 
- Personal Well Being
 - Finance, Benefits and Debt 
 - Dependency & Recovery 
 
 Women’s CRS are available for women on probation on a community/suspended sentence order with a RAR or on licence/post-sentence supervision. The accommodation and social inclusion ‘mentoring’ service will also be delivered pre-release for those released on licence.
